extension.description: Episodehunter keeps automatically a record of what you are watching and can there by keep a comprehensive history of all TV shows and movies you have watched and give tips on what to see next. You are required to have an EpisodeHunter account for this plugin. Create an account on episodehunter.tv
extension.news: v2.0.5 (2018-07-08) - Bugfix regarding that episodes did not get marked as watched
